scripts.test: npm run test:none && npm run test:json && npm run test:tap && npm run test:pretty
scripts.build: for MOD in bdd tap pretty json; do pushd $MOD; npm run build; popd; done
scripts.watch: for MOD in bdd tap pretty json; do pushd $MOD; npm run watch & popd; done
scripts.install: for MOD in bdd run tap pretty json; do pushd $MOD; npm install; popd; done
scripts.publish:bdd: pushd bdd && npm install && npm publish && popd
scripts.publish:run: pushd run && npm install && npm publish && popd
scripts.publish:tap: pushd tap && npm install && npm publish && popd
scripts.publish:pretty: pushd pretty && npm install && npm publish && popd
scripts.publish:json: pushd json && npm install && npm publish && popd
scripts.publish: node version.js && npm run publish:bdd && npm run publish:run && npm run publish:tap && npm run publish:pretty && npm run publish:json

hooks.pre-commit: node version.js && find . -name 'package.json' | grep -v node_modules | xargs git add README.md LICENSE.md RATIONALE.md && lint-staged
